mapper.select: select pi.play_no, pi.play_title, pi.genre, pi.play_desc, pi.rated, pi.book_cnt_total, pi.play_thumbnail, pi.seat_price_code , ps.open_date, ps.close_date from play_info pi, play_schedule ps where genre = '연극' and pi.play_no = ps.play_no GROUP BY pi.play_no having count(*)>1 order by book_cnt_total desc;

select pi.play_no, pi.play_title, pi.genre, pi.play_desc, pi.rated, pi.book_cnt_total, pi.play_thumbnail, pi.seat_price_code , ps.open_date, ps.close_date from play_info pi, play_schedule ps where genre = '뮤지컬' and pi.play_no = ps.play_no GROUP BY pi.play_no having count(*)>1 order by book_cnt_total desc;

select pf.play_no, pf.play_title, pf.genre, pf.play_desc, pf.rated, pf.book_cnt_total, pf.play_thumbnail, pf.seat_price_code, pf.play_spec , ps.open_date, ps.close_date, ps.runtime, ps.play_date, ps.play_time, ps.tht_no, ps.hall_no, ps.remain_seat , sd.seat_price_code, sd.seat_price , ti.tht_addr, ti.tht_name , h.hall_name from play_info pf, play_schedule ps, seat_price_code sd, tht_info ti, hall h where pf.play_no = #{play_no} and pf.play_no = ps.play_no and pf.seat_price_code = sd.seat_price_code and h.tht_no = ti.tht_no and h.hall_no = ps.hall_no GROUP BY pf.play_no having count(*)>1;
